Articles.Description: David Cronenberg’s Crimes of the Future is set in a world in which the presence of pain in a movie or a novel would immediately mark it out as a period drama. It is also set in a world in which, to quote a worker from its shadowy National Organ Registry, bein…
Articles.Content: The film itself, by contrast, never really cuts that deeply into Tenser as a man, and although some critics have interpreted this as a failing, it seems to me to be an intentional demonstration of th… [+2170 chars]

Articles.Author: khushi12limb12
Articles.Title: Ayushmann Khurrana: Holding out for An Action Hero
Articles.Description: Ayushmann Khurrana has become known for making different choices as an actor, irrespective of the results.In his decade-long career, the unconventional actor has played a variety of characters, including a sperm donor in his debut film Vicky Donor (2012), som…
